attributes.action: re-open the November 2006 DSA pay remit, & allow the 580 'leapfrogged' driving examiners to receive their correctly entitled pay award.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As part of a Driving Standards Agency pay award approx. 580 members of staff failed to receive their rise in pay, when this was realised by the DSA & unions, the Treasury was approached to re-open the November 2006 pay remit & allow these members of staff their correct pay. Which the Treasury has refused to do.
